title: UK Contemporary Marlow Retreat in Heart of Buckinghamshire near River Thames
description: Let the glorious English countryside capture your heart with a stay at the contemporary Crowne Plaza Marlow, an IHG Hotel, set alongside the River Thames. From this perfect springboard, spend days taking in green surroundings, wandering along bunting-strung streets hiding gastronomic delights, or breathing in fresh air on hiking and cycling routes. Savour contemporary cuisine at Glaze Restaurant, settle in with views of the River Thames or get lost in a tranquil treatment at the hotelâ€™s spa.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Marlow, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Fieldhouse Lane, Marlow SL7 1GJ, United Kingdom
